articles.author: SHANNON TEOH
articles.title: Some of Asia's elite in the spotlight after leak of Pandora Papers - The Straits Times
articles.description: About a dozen Malaysians were among those named in the 12 million files making up the Pandora Papers.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: KUALA LUMPUR - Dozens of influential Asians, including ruling party politicians, are among thousands of people around the world linked to offshore companies or trusts in the latest leak of confidenti… [+5718 chars]
